SEARCH
Package Engine.EntityComponents

Class ComponentData

java.lang.Object
Engine.EntityComponents.ComponentData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ComponentData extends Object implements Serializable
The ComponentData class represents the data associated with an entity's components. It stores the entity's ID, type, UUID, and a map of component IDs to their corresponding values. Used for replicating entity data between the host and clients in the game engine.
Author:
haotian
